overview:
Luis San Miguel assumed the role of Chief Financial Officer of CareCloud Corporation in January 2010. Mr. San Miguel is responsible for all accounting and finance functions including treasury, planning, and financial reporting. Mr. San Miguel also has responsibility over human resources and administration.

Mr. San Miguel previously served as Senior Vice President, Finance and Chief Financial Officer of Oceania Cruises, Inc. where he actively participated in the negotiations and sale of a majority interest in Oceania to Apollo Management VI, L.P. for $275 million. Mr. San Miguel also served as Chief Financial Officer for Answerthink Consulting Group where he directed the completion of an Initial Public Offering of Answerthink’s common stock and integrated five acquisitions over a two year period beginning with the company’s inception. Mr. San Miguel also served as Chief Financial Officer at Yupi Internet, Inc. and held a number of finance roles at Burger King Corporation and KPMG where he served as VP of Finance of the Strategic Services Consulting division which accounted for $500 million of annual revenues prior to his departure. Mr. San Miguel graduated from Fordham University in New York City in 1981 with a dual major in public accounting and finance and is a member of the American and Florida Institutes of CPAs.
